column1: Table A-201:  Total Soil N2O Emissions (Direct and Indirect), Soil Organic C Stock Changes and Rice CH4 Emissions from Agricultural Lands by State in 2015 (MMT CO2 Eq.)
a This table only includes N2O emissions estimated by DayCent using the Tier 3 method.
b N2O emissions are not reported for Hawaii except from cropland organic soils, which are estimated with the Tier 1 method and therefore not included in this table.
